author: kfogel
msg: * STATUS: Nominate and vote for r33201.

author: hwright
msg: Deprecate svn_io_file_checksum(), which used the old-style digests in
favor of a svn_io_file_checksum2(), which has both a simpler
implementation and works with the newer checksum type.

author: cmpilato
msg: On the fs-rep-sharing branch:  disallow the deltification of any
representations not created in the transaction whose nodes are being
deltified.  This should prevent both unnecessary re-deltification, and
representation dependency cycles, in most[1] situations.
(maybe_deltify_mutable_rep): New helper function for the core work
done by svn_fs_base__dag_deltify().  Added to that pre-existing
logic now is an optional comparison against a transaction ID (to
outsource all the real work to new maybe_deltify_mutable_rep() helper.
[1] Hyrum Wright and I remain concerned about hybrid-pedigree
repositories which may have been using reverse deltas
(fulltext-at-tip) storage for a period of time and then were
'svnadmin upgrade'd into forward-delta storage.  What happens when

author: hwright
msg: Update the dav server survey for Sept and Oct 2008.

author: djames
